channel.title: Reflection Client questions
channel.description: So i have just started using a Reflection client. I wanted to add some of my own commands like spawning and fixing the commands like Wot " which is supposed to give 10k whips ". Is their any tutorials that can help me understand how to add my own commands or is their anybody that can help me with this. Thanks

item.title: Reflection Client questions
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

mattiasrosendahl:

Well, its not possible to spawn items from the client. Unless there is an object giving u items…

It is actually 100% possible if the server fails to check that you have the item when you attempt to bank or sell it. There are still some that have those flaws.

Read full topic

item.title: Reflection Client questions
item.dc:creator: @mattiasrosendahl mattiasrosendahl
item.description:

item.title: Reflection Client questions
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Create methods that will retrieve methods and fields, I’m sure the reflection client download has them. Then you can access anything within the files and manipulate them to create your own commands.

Most decent servers have fixed the spawning method.

Read full topic
